title: Mysteries, Monsters, And Untold Secrets
description: Is Bigfoot roaming the western Canadian wilderness? Are U.F.Os's actually spaceships, sent from other galaxies? Which mysterious beings built the huge statues that stare from Easter Island in the Pacific? Have you seen Nessie at Loch Ness?These are a few of the baffling, real-life mysteries you'll find, with photographs.... in "Mysteries, Monsters, And Untold Secrets".
author: George Laycock
